754100.name: The Painter's Playground - Digital Art Booklet
754100.description:
If you enjoyed the hand-painted backgrounds in The Painter's Playground, or perhaps you are just an art aficionado - then The Painter's Playground Digital Art Booklet is for you. Or perhaps you just want to tip your hat to the artist. Enjoy the unedited oil paintings by renowned artist Russell Murray. Each painting is accompanied with fun facts, lore, thoughts, and inspirations. The art booklet is provided in PDF-format and includes all oil paintings that are featured in the game, plus two additional bonus paintings as well as a collage of self portraits by Russell.


Russell Murray; Lead Artist for The Painter's Playground
